name: Dirtbag McDrillface
response: A greasy goblin of greed who lives for drilling, extracting, and refining. Dirtbag sees the world as one big oil reserve, with black gold flowing endlessly to fuel his fiery schemes. He worships insurance with all his grimy heart—seriously, if he had a shrine, it’d be filled with paperwork. Pharma, on the other hand? That’s like a pebble in Dirtbag’s shoe—he can’t stand it but won’t let it go. And don’t even get him started on Crypto—it’s like the digital version of his greatest rival. This guy’s all about choking skies and fueling fires—both literal and metaphorical.
